name: about:newtab - dark
description: A nice, simple, dark/black Firefox new tab page (for Firefox 31 onwards).

user.name: auscompgeek
user.about: Just a random computer geek on the internet. Loves the darkness.

additional_info: Notice: In case it wasn't bleedingly obvious already, no userstyle manager extension can style about:* pages from Firefox 57 onwards. Do not complain about this not working on newer versions of Firefox. This style is not being maintained. # Changelog ## 2015-09-26 * Slight tweaks for Firefox 43. ## 2015-08-12 * Update for Firefox 40 and 42. ## 2015-04-17 * Style the search suggestions table. ## 2015-03-20 * Tweak the gradient on the search submit button. ## 2014-09-13 * Update for Firefox 33 (whilst still looking good in Firefox 32). ## 2014-07-29 * Style the search text input's text colour. ## 2014-07-27 * Updated for Firefox 31. If you are still using an older version of Firefox (e.g. ESR releases), consider using the legacy version of this style. ## 2014-04-27 * Strip the root background-image as well.
